```{r}
#| context: setup
#| include: false
library(tmap)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
tmap_mode("view")

typ <- st_read("data/typology_v3.14_EEZ_wdpa_4326_v2_centroids.gpkg")

```

# Map

## {.toolbar}

```{r}

selectInput('select', "Select Juristictions", 
            choices = c("Global", unique(typ$UNION)),
            selected = "Global")
```


## Row

```{r}
tmapOutput("map")
```


```{r}
#| context: server

mapdat <- reactive({
  if(input$select != "Global"){
    typ %>% filter(UNION == input$select)
  } else {
    typ
  }
})

output$map <- renderTmap({
  qtm(mapdat())
})

```
